com.sloca.dao

Class GroupsDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sloca.dao.GroupsDAO

  • public class GroupsDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the processing of groups in locations

      Add locations to the groups that is identified as subgroups.
      static java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> getGroups(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate)
      This method takes in a date time range (start and end date) and returns the list of groups within the specified time range in a format suitable for further internal processing
      static int getTotalNumOfUsers(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate)
      Returns a number of distinct mac address(es) found in location database within a given time range.
      static AGDstatus getUsersInLocation(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate)
      This method takes in a date time range (start and end date) and returns the list of groups within the specified time range in a format suitable for json output
      static java.util.ArrayList<UserLocationInterval> processList(java.util.ArrayList<UserLocationInterval> unsorted_list)
      This method takes in a raw unprocessed records and combine The recordS if they overlap each others (i.e.: is userA stays in locationA from 12:01 to 12:03 and locationA from 12:03 to 12:05, these records will be combined to one where userA stays in location A from 12:01 to 12:05)
      static java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> removeSubGroups(java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> cloned_list)
      Takes in a list of groups and locations, and remove duplicate group(s)

      • getTotalNumOfUsers

        public static int getTotalNumOfUsers(java.lang.String startDate,
                                     java.lang.String endDate)
        Returns a number of distinct mac address(es) found in location database within a given time range.
        Parameters:
        startDate - the start datetime of a range
        endDate - the end datetime of a range
        Returns:
        a number of mac address(es) found, inclusive of startDate, exclusive of endDate

      • getUsersInLocation

        public static AGDstatus getUsersInLocation(java.lang.String startDate,
                                           java.lang.String endDate)
        This method takes in a date time range (start and end date) and returns the list of groups within the specified time range in a format suitable for json output
        Parameters:
        startDate - the start datetime of the time range
        endDate - the end datetime of the time range
        Returns:
        an object contains the list of groups within the specified time range, inclusive of startDate, exclusive of endDate
        See Also:
        AGDstatus

      • getGroups

        public static java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> getGroups(java.lang.String startDate,
                                                            java.lang.String endDate)
        This method takes in a date time range (start and end date) and returns the list of groups within the specified time range in a format suitable for further internal processing
        Parameters:
        startDate - the start datetime of the time range
        endDate - the end datetime of the time range
        Returns:
        the list of groups within the specified time range, inclusive of startDate, exclusive of endDate
        See Also:
        GroupLocations

      • processList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<UserLocationInterval> processList(java.util.ArrayList<UserLocationInterval> unsorted_list)
        This method takes in a raw unprocessed records and combine The recordS if they overlap each others (i.e.: is userA stays in locationA from 12:01 to 12:03 and locationA from 12:03 to 12:05, these records will be combined to one where userA stays in location A from 12:01 to 12:05)
        Parameters:
        unsorted_list - contains all unprocessed records retrieved from database
        Returns:
        returns the processed user list whereby each user is tagged to a location for a specific time period
        See Also:
        UserLocationInterval

      • addLocationsToSubgroup

        public static java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> addLocationsToSubgroup(java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> cloned_list)
        Add locations to the groups that is identified as subgroups.

        This method is used internally to process group list

        Parameters:
        cloned_list - raw list of unprocessed group list
        Returns:
        the list of groups with updated locations
        See Also:
        GroupLocations

      • removeSubGroups

        public static java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> removeSubGroups(java.util.ArrayList<GroupLocations> cloned_list)
        Takes in a list of groups and locations, and remove duplicate group(s)

        This method is used internally to process group list

        Parameters:
        cloned_list - raw list of unprocessed group list
        Returns:
        updated list of groups and locations with sub groups removed
        See Also:
        GroupLocations
